titleStmt.title: A collection of some verses out of the Psalms of David suited to several occasions. Composed in two parts, cantus & bassus: being [the] common tunes to the Psalms in metre, now used in parish-churches. To which is added, some instructions for singing of them. Collected forMr. Henry Hunt, for the use of his scholars, and such as delight in psalmody.
titleStmt.author: Hunt, Henry, 17th/18th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. Heptinstall for Henry Playford; and are to be sold by Anthony Boys at his shop in St. Albans in Hertfordshire,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Price stitch'd 1 s. 6 d.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in St. Albans in Hertfordshire
